verses.roman:
huṅkāra kari' yamunāra jale dilā jhāṅpa
prabhu dekhi' sabāra mane haila bhaya-kāṅpa

synonyms: huṅkāra kari'—making a loud sound; yamunāra jale—in the water of the River Yamunā; dilā—gave; jhāṅpa—a plunge; prabhu dekhi'-seeing Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sabāra—of everyone; mane—in the mind; haila—there was; bhaya-kāṅpa—fear and trembling.
translation: Indeed, as soon as Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu saw the River Yamunā, He immediately made a great sound and jumped into the water. Everyone was filled with fear and trembling to see this.
